markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Sense Ki](/Feats.aspx?ID=2730) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 75</row>

**Prerequisites**
ki spells

</column>

---

You can read the presence of ki in your area. You gain imprecise [lifesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=21) out to a range of 30 feet.
name: Sense Ki
